alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Monroe (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 07 at 2:32AM CST until March 07 at 2:45AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN MONROE AND EAST CENTRAL ARKANSAS COUNTIES... At 232 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near St. Charles, or near White River National Wildlife Refuge, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... St. Charles... Indian Bay... Ethel... Cross Roads in Monroe County... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
